command.name: create

help.short: Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

command.name: update

help.short: Space-separated tags: key[=value] [key[=value] ...]. Use "" to clear existing tags.
Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.ipsecPolicies" options="ipsec-policies" group="Properties">

help.short: The DH Groups used for initial SA.
The Pfs Groups used for new child SA.
The payload size in KB for P2S client.
The lifetime in seconds for P2S client.

help.short: The DH Groups used in IKE Phase 1 for initial SA.
The Pfs Groups used in IKE Phase 2 for new child SA.
The IPSec Security Association (also called Quick Mode or Phase 2 SA) payload size in KB for a site to site VPN tunnel.
The IPSec Security Association (also called Quick Mode or Phase 2 SA) lifetime in seconds for a site to site VPN tunnel.
